Developer Terms of Use
des:
With the QLightBle skill and Alexa,you can now interact with your lights,groups,and scenes via the Bridge.To get started,seletct the "Enable Skill" button in Alexa App to link your Q light BLE account and say, "Alexa,discover devices".

Light Controls:
- You can turn devices on/off,for example:"Alexa,turn on/off the RGB Light".
- You can change the brightness,for example:"Alexa,dim RGB Light".

Color Controls:
- It offers possibilities for playing with colors on color lights,for example:"Alexa,set the RGB Light to purple"
- You can control shades of white,for example:"Alexa,make the RGB Light softer"

Scenes:
You can create scenes in Q light BLE app.To control scenes,simply tell Alexa to turn on <scene name>
- "Alexa,turn on Sleep mode"

Groups:
- You can control several lights with group name,for example:"Alexa,turn on All Lights".

There are two ways to define groups.
- User the name(s) you set up already in the Q light BLE app,OR
- Create an Alexa group and add the device(s) to the group in the Alexa App.
